articles.author: CQN Magazine
articles.description: ADAM IDAH is living the dream since his £9.5million return to Celtic was sealed this week. Brendan Rodgers had marked him as a priority signing and, following over two months of negotiating with Norwich City, the Republic of Ireland international is back at the champions after his short-term loan last season. Idah fired in nine goals [...]
articles.title: GOOSEBUMPS, GOALS AND GRINS: IDAH’S IN PARADISE

articles.author: CQN Magazine
articles.description: FORMER Celtic keeper John Fallon celebrates his 84th birthday today. Hopefully, the Hoops legend will be showered with gifts, but none will be as precious as the one he received in April 2019. Fallon, who had been the faithful understudy to Ronnie Simpson all the way through the historic European Cup campaign in season 1966/67, [...]

articles.description: CELTIC have been linked with Lausanne’s £4.3million-rated midfielder Alvyn Sanches. Brendan Rodgers is making sure the champions will not be short of numbers if Matt O’Riley’s asking price of around the £25million mark is met before the transfer deadline on August 30. Persistent Atalanta have just had their fifth bid booted out for the Denmark [...]

articles.author: Paul67
articles.description: With impresario timing, Celtic dropped confirmation that Adam Idah signed a five-year contract yesterday evening.  Enough time for Tuesday’s football to be disembowelled (agree, a horrid term, but if you read/listened in, you’ll know where I’m coming from), and setting today’s news agenda ahead of the League Cup weekend.  If you know your history, Jock [...]

articles.description: DO YOU ever get the impression you have just Rip Van Winkled your way through a couple of decades? articles.description: CELTIC are about to miss out on Scotland striker Tommy Conway who is poised to sign for Middlesbrough today. Conway, who made his international debut in the 2-2 friendly draw with Finland in June and [...]
articles.title: CELTIC MISS OUT ON £4.5m TARGET

articles.author: CQN Magazine
articles.description: ADAM IDAH was smiles better when he sealed his £9.5million return to Celtic this evening. Now the paperwork has been taken care of, the 23-year-old Republic [...]

articles.author: Paul67
articles.description: Uefa Champions League financial distribution changes significantly this season from the previous model, in line with changes to the tournament itself.  The old TV Pool no longer exists, replaced by a Value Distribution payment, which is majority based on the value of your TV market, with a factor determined by how well you have performed [...]

articles.author: CQN Magazine
articles.description: CELTIC have knocked back a derisory offer of £275,000 from Millwall for midfielder Daniel Kelly. But the 18-year-old prospect will still joing the Championship when his contract expires on January 1 2025. The Hoops were demanding £500,000 for the player to leave immediately, but the London club refused to pay up and are prepared to get [...]
articles.title: KELLY MOVE DELAY

articles.author: CQN Magazine
articles.description: SOUTH KOREAN midfielder Kwon Hyeuk-kyu has signed a season-long loan with Hibs. The 23-year-old anchorman, who joined the champions in an £850,000 deal from K-League outfit Busan IPark last summer, has yet to kick a ball in competitive action for the Hoops. Kwon also left Parkhead in January in a short-term switch to St Mirren [...]
articles.title: GOING, GOING, KWON – FOR A SECOND TIME

articles.author: CQN Magazine
articles.description: CELTIC are preparing to laugh off a cheeky £1.2million offer for Maik Nawrocki. The 23-year-old German-born former Poland Under-21 international centre-back arrived in a £4.3million switch from Legia Warsaw last summer. The defender, who came to Parkhead with a soaring reputation, made his competitive debut in the 4-2 Premiership opening-day win over Ross County at Parkhead [...]
articles.title: CELTIC WILL LAUGH OFF ‘ROCKY’ BID

articles.author: CQN Magazine
articles.description: GUSTAF LAGERBIELKE has knocked back a loan move to Malmo. The frozen-out Celtic defender, who cost £3million when he arrived from Elfsborg last summer, rejected the opportunity because he didn’t want to make a quickfire return to his homeland, according to a report in local media Expressen. The Swedish international centre-back seemed a natural successor to [...]
articles.title: NO-GO GUSTAF

articles.author: CQN Magazine

The London club are poised to pounce for highly-rated Kelly who becomes a free agent [...]

articles.description: It is surely no coincidence that Norwich City accepted Celtic’s offer for Adam Idah, reportedly £8.5m up front with another £1m dependent on results and a 15% sell-on fee, within hours of the club being sold to an American investment group. On accepting the deal for Idah, City added £8.5m to their balance sheet – [...]

articles.description: AT WHAT stage will Celtic tell Atalanta to “va al diavolo”? I’m reliably informed that is Italian for “get lost”. Apparently, they are now poised to improve on their previous offer of £20million following their initial £14million proposal. [...]

The players who finished the season with a Cup final win at Hampden against the rangers are back together. Adam Idah returns to the Champions as he signs five-year-deal with Celtic.
